definition: flour/noodles/(of food) soft (not crunchy)/(slang) (of a person) ineffectual/spineless
face/side/surface/aspect/top/classifier for flat surfaces such as drums, mirrors, flags etc

sentences.english: The surface is skimmed off while the sludge is pumped away to a separate treatment facility.
sentences.chinese: 浮面的将被撇去，淤泥被泵到另外一个处理装置。

sentences.english: Now that the Games are over, it's a good bet that the turmoil will resurface.
sentences.chinese: 如今奥运结束了，几乎可以肯定这种混乱会重新浮面。

definition: to float about/(of a feeling) to show on the face/(of speech, friendship etc) shallow/vague
to interrogate and get to the bottom of sth
variant of 透徹|透彻[tou4 che4]
to spread out after being diluted or melted/to dissolve into a liquid
pure and limpid/(of a person) quick-witted
grease or fat blobs at the surface of a liquid/tricky and dissolute
variant of 徹底|彻底[che4 di3]
sticky/glutinous/(Tw) to adhere/to stick on/to glue
